Package uk.ac.susx.mlcl.byblo.measures

Measures of similarity, proximity, and distance.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Proximity Proximity defines a common interface that all similarity measure must implement.
 

Class Summary
AbstractMIProximity AbstractMIProximity is a class that mutual information (MI) based proximity measures can extend.
AbstractProximity  
Confusion Proximity measure computing the confusion probability between the given vector pair.
Cosine Measure of orthogonality between vectors.
CosineMi  
CrMi Parameters β γ Special Case - 1 harmonic mean of precision and recall (F-score) (DiceMi) β 0 weighted arithmetic mean of precision and recall 1 0 precision 0 0 recall 0.5 0 unweighted arithmetic mean Weeds, Julie, and David Weir.
Dice  
DiceMi  
Hindle  
Jaccard The Jaccard Co-efficient on binary features.
JaccardMi  
Jensen Jensen-Shannon Divergence similarity measure, defined as a balanced average of KL-Divergences from the two entry distributions to the average distribution of both.
KendallTau tau(q,r) = sum_i_j( sign((qi - qj)(ri - rj)) / (2 * |V|) )
Lee The alpha-skew divergence measure as defined in Lee (2001) A weighted measure of "information gain".
Lin  
Lp Notes
Overlap  
RecallMi This measure attempts to encapsulate, for each pair of feature vectors A and B, how strongly A is described by B.
ReversedProximity Decorator that reverses the features sets, for calculating asymmetric measures with the inputs the other way around.
Tanimoto
